frameset.edef: divested of, stripped of or deprived of

role.argrole: entity is free from or devoid of

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM أداء)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM نابض) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجوهر)))) (PUNC ,) (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM عار) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفوائض))))
